column7: Camcontrol Officers in Phnom Penh jointly cooperated with Anti-Economic Police and the ------Ministry of Interior to investigate seafood for unregulated chemicals.------Prohibited chemicals tested for were not found
column8: but checks found a ------thick jelly-like substance in shrimp heads
column9: so they were sent off for more analysis.------After investigating
column10: the deputy prosecutor decided to destroy the 7
column12: which were sent to be burned at the landfill.
